cause.description:
We are a non-profit community development organization that takes volunteers to developing countries to work, learn and reflect. Through the process of living and working with these communities and their local leadership on construction, public health and environmental projects, Bridges promotes cross-cultural learning, a deepening awareness of our global interdependence and a commitment to the common good.
1. Shared Work- Working together with communities on development projects.
2. Empowerment- Recognizing and celebrating our similarities, leading us to engage in building a better world for future generations.
3. Elightenment- Building cross- cultural understanding and awareness.
cause.mission: Bridges to Community sends groups of volunteers to developing countries to work on community projects, promoting cross-cultural learning and global awareness.
cause.name: Bridges to Community, Inc.
